title: 4th ASIA OPTOMETRIC CONGRESS 2024
description: HighlightOur conference program features a range of workshops that will cover a variety of compelling topics, including myopic control, specialty contact lenses, visual training, and other optometric subjects. Each workshop will be facilitated by leading experts in the field, who will provide unique insights and perspectives on the subject matter. In addition to the workshops, our conference will provide ample opportunities for attendees to engage in networking activities and discussions with peers and industry leaders. The event will be an excellent platform for attendees to showcase their own research and case studies, and to learn from the experiences of others. We are confident that this conference will offer valuable insights and knowledge-sharing opportunities that will help attendees advance their careers and stay ahead of the latest trends in optometry. We encourage you to take advantage of this opportunity to engage with fellow professionals, build new relationships, and connect with industry experts. We look forward to welcoming you to this exciting event and to sharing our passion for optometry with you.
